author: richieRich01

comments.content: That appears to be [Robert](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105062632/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/roberta-d/)a - manually made a bit heavier. Robert Trogman based this 1962 font on the lettering on a Belgian restaurant sign. Howzabout that, Yves?!
Belgian restaurants are the best — at least the lettering on their shop fronts. :^D
